title: Contact joined telegram notifications are terrible‚Ä¶
text:
Who, for the love of god, thought it would be a good idea to have a notification and new chat for every single contact?!? I have nearly 2,000 contacts in my phone, and after one week of using Telegram it became clear that the app is unusable. It‚Äôs a constant flood of ‚ÄúContact name joined Telegram.‚Äù All my actual chats are pushed below hundreds of these utterly useless notifications, and the number of unread chats is over a thousand, which means I have no idea how many ACTUAL MESSAGES I have.

Now there is a setting to turn this off, but these notifications are enabled by default. Meaning I spent an hour of my time deleting chats one by one (of course there‚Äôs no ‚Äúselect all‚Äù) until I finally had a usable interface. I don‚Äôt know who thought this would be a good idea, but that person should be fired and possibly imprisoned. Terrible experience.
